mountain.description: Natural constraint - unchangeable given current understanding of reality
mountain.strategy: Accept - Work within natural constraints, adapt strategies accordingly

rope.description: Pure coordination - low extraction, solves collective action problems
rope.strategy: Maintain - Preserve coordination mechanisms, ensure fair access and participation

scaffold.description: Temporary support - low extraction coordination with a defined sunset clause
scaffold.strategy: Monitor sunset - Ensure transition mechanisms are in place, remove when no longer needed

piton.description: Maintained constraint - low extraction but high suppression costs, should be cut but isn't
piton.strategy: Bypass or eliminate - High maintenance cost without value, find alternatives

tangled_rope.description: Hybrid coordination/extraction - provides genuine coordination while extracting asymmetrically
tangled_rope.strategy: Reform carefully - Preserve coordination core while cutting extractive elements. Requires surgical separation.

snare.description: Pure extraction - minimal coordination benefit, high asymmetric extraction
snare.strategy: Cut - Remove extractive constraints, replace with fair alternatives if coordination needed
